Package renderer

Class BasicRayTracer

java.lang.Object
renderer.RayTracerBase
renderer.BasicRayTracer
public class BasicRayTracer
extends RayTracerBase
class used to trace rays for the rendering engine

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean _bb
    boolean value to determine use of bounding box improvement
    private static double INITIAL_K
    0 leads to no reflections at all, but no significant difference with any other value
    private static int MAX_CALC_COLOR_LEVEL
    how many reflections we want to calculate - The maximum value of the tree height (number of intersections) for reflection/refraction calculations for a geometry the camera sees.
    private static double MIN_CALC_COLOR_K
    the minimum value of transparency/refraction to be considered if the calculation for reflection/refraction is necessary in the current geometry.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_CALC_COLOR_LEVEL

      private static final int MAX_CALC_COLOR_LEVEL
      how many reflections we want to calculate - The maximum value of the tree height (number of intersections) for reflection/refraction calculations for a geometry the camera sees. Stop condition for transparency: how far we consider to calculate the ray's intersections with other geometries which are behind original geometry. Stop condition for refraction: how far we consider to calculate the intersections of the rays which created by refractions in the original geometric body. USE WITH CAUTION! higher values leads to performance decreasing rapidly
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • MIN_CALC_COLOR_K

      private static final double MIN_CALC_COLOR_K
      the minimum value of transparency/refraction to be considered if the calculation for reflection/refraction is necessary in the current geometry.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • INITIAL_K

      private static final double INITIAL_K
      0 leads to no reflections at all, but no significant difference with any other value
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • _bb

      private boolean _bb
      boolean value to determine use of bounding box improvement

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint point, Ray ray)
      function which returns the color of the object the ray is intersecting if no intersection was found, returns the ambient light's color
      Parameters:
      point - - the point on the 3D model
      ray - - ray to the point
      Returns:
      the color in the point

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray ray, int level, double k)
      function which returns the color of the object the ray is intersecting if no intersection was found, returns the ambient light's color
      Parameters:
      intersection - - closest intersection point on the object
      ray - - ray to the point
      level - - recursion iterations upper limit
      k - - initial value
      Returns:
      the color in the point with all the effects

    • calcGlobalEffects

      private Color calcGlobalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint, Ray ray, int level, double K)
      function to calculate transparency and reflections
      Parameters:
      geoPoint - - the tested point
      ray - - the ray going through the point
      level - - recursion iterations upper limit
      K - - initiation value
      Returns:
      the Color of the returned light after calculating all the required effects

    • calcLocalEffects

      private Color calcLocalEffects​(Intersectable.GeoPoint point, Ray ray, double k)
      function which returns the color of the object the ray is intersecting after adding the required effects
      Parameters:
      point - - the point on the object
      ray - - ray to the point
      k - = recursion level
      Returns:
      the color in the point with local effects

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, Vector l, Vector n, Color lightIntensity)
      function to calculate the diffusive component of the light
      Parameters:
      kd - - diffuse attenuation factor
      l - - the vector between the light source and the point
      n - - the normal of l with the body
      lightIntensity - - the color of the light
      Returns:
      the light after the calculated effects

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity, double nl)
      function to calculate the specular component of the light
      Parameters:
      ks - - specular attenuation factor
      l - - the vector between the light source and the point
      n - - the normal of l with the body
      v - - the camera vector
      nShininess - - how shiny the object is
      lightIntensity - - the color of the light
      nl - - n.dotProduct(l), received as a param to save unnecessary calculations
      Returns:
      the light after the calculated effects

      ray - - the original ray

    • transparency

      private double transparency​(LightSource light, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint)
      function to determine the level of transparency of the point
      Parameters:
      light - - the light source which we measure the distance from
      l - - the vector between the light source and the point
